thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Deviation greater than 20% from standard pouring speed for the material
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors the rate of liquid flow to detect abnormal pouring speed.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Fast or slow pouring speeds may cause spills or uneven filling.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Variation greater than 5% from the desired volume
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Compares the amount of liquid poured to the target volume.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Excessive or insufficient pouring can be detected using a measuring container.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Spillage greater than 10% of the target container's volume
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors liquid overflow or spills during pouring.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Spillage can be detected visually or through a liquid sensor in the target container.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Angle deviation greater than 5 degrees from optimal spout alignment
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Tracks spout alignment with the target container.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Misalignment detected through visual feedback or sensor data showing a miss in target container.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Flow rate variance greater than 15% from expected for the liquid type
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors whether the liquid flow is consistent and smooth.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Abrupt flow changes indicate pouring issues such as clogging or misalignment.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Residual liquid exceeding 2% of the total liquid poured
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Detects liquid left in the container after pouring.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Measured liquid amount in the container indicates excess residual liquid.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Deviation greater than 10 cm from optimal pour height
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors the height from which the liquid is poured.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Too high or too low pouring causes splashing or overflow, detected by measuring tools or visual inspection.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Angle deviation greater than 5 degrees from ideal pour angle
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Measures the angle at which the liquid is being poured.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Improper pouring angle detected using angle sensors or visual monitoring.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Pouring time deviates by more than 15% from the expected duration for the given volume
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Tracks the time it takes to pour a certain amount of liquid.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Slower or faster pouring times indicate anomalies in the pouring process.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Flow stops or slows to less than 50% of normal speed
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Detects any blockages or clogs in the container or spout.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Flow inconsistencies or pressure sensors detect clogs during pouring.
